rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose up to two target creatures you control. Each creature chosen this way explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Lands you control have “{T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary permanents you control.”
